analysis.description:
MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_chucks/8/0x0e55c54249f25f70d519b7fb1c20e3331e7ba76d.sol#128) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/8/0x0e55c54249f25f70d519b7fb1c20e3331e7ba76d.sol#232-269)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/8/0x0e55c54249f25f70d519b7fb1c20e3331e7ba76d.sol#349-371)
	- generateTokens (/unique_chucks/8/0x0e55c54249f25f70d519b7fb1c20e3331e7ba76d.sol#499-514)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/8/0x0e55c54249f25f70d519b7fb1c20e3331e7ba76d.sol#521-536)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/8/0x0e55c54249f25f70d519b7fb1c20e3331e7ba76d.sol#599-606) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.approve (/unique_chucks/8/0x0e55c54249f25f70d519b7fb1c20e3331e7ba76d.sol#283-300):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(TokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount)) (/unique_chucks/8/0x0e55c54249f25f70d519b7fb1c20e3331e7ba76d.sol#298-299)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_chucks/8/0x0e55c54249f25f70d519b7fb1c20e3331e7ba76d.sol#299)

MiniMeToken.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/8/0x0e55c54249f25f70d519b7fb1c20e3331e7ba76d.sol#630-645) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(controller,balance) (/unique_chucks/8/0x0e55c54249f25f70d519b7fb1c20e3331e7ba76d.sol#644-645)

NectarController.doMakerPayment (/unique_chucks/8/0x0e55c54249f25f70d519b7fb1c20e3331e7ba76d.sol#1069-1087) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenContract.pledgeFees(msg.value) (/unique_chucks/8/0x0e55c54249f25f70d519b7fb1c20e3331e7ba76d.sol#1075)

NectarController.doTakerPayment (/unique_chucks/8/0x0e55c54249f25f70d519b7fb1c20e3331e7ba76d.sol#1094-1101) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenContract.pledgeFees(msg.value) (/unique_chucks/8/0x0e55c54249f25f70d519b7fb1c20e3331e7ba76d.sol#1096)

NectarController.doProxyAccounting (/unique_chucks/8/0x0e55c54249f25f70d519b7fb1c20e3331e7ba76d.sol#1102-1116) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenContract.pledgeFees(_pledgedAmount) (/unique_chucks/8/0x0e55c54249f25f70d519b7fb1c20e3331e7ba76d.sol#1111)

NectarController.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/8/0x0e55c54249f25f70d519b7fb1c20e3331e7ba76d.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,balance) (/unique_chucks/8/0x0e55c54249f25f70d519b7fb1c20e3331e7ba76d.sol)

MiniMeToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_chucks/8/0x0e55c54249f25f70d519b7fb1c20e3331e7ba76d.sol#567) shadows:
	- MiniMeToken.min (function @ /unique_chucks/8/0x0e55c54249f25f70d519b7fb1c20e3331e7ba76d.sol#609-611)

Reentrancy in NEC.NEC (/unique_chucks/8/0x0e55c54249f25f70d519b7fb1c20e3331e7ba76d.sol#713-726):
	External calls:
	- generateTokens(efxVaultWallet,1000000000000000000000000000) (/unique_chucks/8/0x0e55c54249f25f70d519b7fb1c20e3331e7ba76d.sol#725-726)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- burningEnabled (/unique_chucks/8/0x0e55c54249f25f70d519b7fb1c20e3331e7ba76d.sol#726)

Reentrancy in NectarController.doMakerPayment (/unique_chucks/8/0x0e55c54249f25f70d519b7fb1c20e3331e7ba76d.sol#1069-1087):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)((tokenContract.controller() != 0) && (msg.value != 0)) (/unique_chucks/8/0x0e55c54249f25f70d519b7fb1c20e3331e7ba76d.sol#1071-1075)
	- tokenContract.pledgeFees(msg.value) (/unique_chucks/8/0x0e55c54249f25f70d519b7fb1c20e3331e7ba76d.sol#1075)
	External calls sending eth:
	- require(bool)(vaultAddress.send(msg.value)) (/unique_chucks/8/0x0e55c54249f25f70d519b7fb1c20e3331e7ba76d.sol#1075-1076)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- windowFinalBlock (/unique_chucks/8/0x0e55c54249f25f70d519b7fb1c20e3331e7ba76d.sol#1080-1081)

Reentrancy in NectarController.doProxyAccounting (/unique_chucks/8/0x0e55c54249f25f70d519b7fb1c20e3331e7ba76d.sol#1102-1116):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)((tokenContract.controller() != 0)) (/unique_chucks/8/0x0e55c54249f25f70d519b7fb1c20e3331e7ba76d.sol#1104)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- windowFinalBlock (/unique_chucks/8/0x0e55c54249f25f70d519b7fb1c20e3331e7ba76d.sol#1108-1111)

NectarController.windowAt (/unique_chucks/8/0x0e55c54249f25f70d519b7fb1c20e3331e7ba76d.sol#1164-1168) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- timestamp < startTime (/unique_chucks/8/0x0e55c54249f25f70d519b7fb1c20e3331e7ba76d.sol#1165-1168)

MiniMeToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/8/0x0e55c54249f25f70d519b7fb1c20e3331e7ba76d.sol#599-606)
	- /unique_chucks/8/0x0e55c54249f25f70d519b7fb1c20e3331e7ba76d.sol#602-603
